basic.title: Basic Declaration
basic.explanation: Python uses dynamic typing - no need to declare types explicitly.

type_hints.title: With Type Hints
type_hints.explanation: Type hints help with IDE support and static analysis but don't enforce types at runtime.

let_const.title: let & const
let_const.explanation: Use let for reassignable variables, const for constants. Avoid var.

basic.title: Explicit Types
basic.explanation: Java is statically typed - every variable needs a declared type.
